comments.body: [~chairmank] Thanks a lot for reporting the problem. I will take a look ASAP.

[~chairmank] We have found the root cause of the bug: we forget to load the pivot into the pivot buffer when the pivot is in the lowest position. The bug was introduced when we tried to improve the algorithm for selecting the pivot. 

We are sorry for bringing you the trouble. In the future, we will provide more test cases for the sorting functionality, and hope there will be no more such problems.
Thanks for fixing this bug. The pull request [https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7837] looks good to me. Are we now waiting for review and approval by a project committer?
[~chairmank] Thanks a lot for reviewing the PR. I think maybe we should wait a few days to see if others have any comments.
